TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509Certificate2 extends System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit X509Certificate2 extends System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate

summary.span: 表示 X.509 证书。

span.span: Represents an X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks X.509 结构源自国际标准化组织（ISO）工作组。The X.509 structure originated in the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) working groups. 此结构可用于表示各种类型的信息，包括标识、权利和持有者属性（权限、年龄、性别、位置、从属关系，等等）。This structure can be used to represent various types of information including identity, entitlement, and holder attributes (permissions, age, sex, location, affiliation, and so forth). 尽管 ISO 规范在结构本身上是最重要的，但 类旨在对 Internet 工程任务组（IETF）公钥基础结构 x.509 （PKIX）工作组所颁发的规范中定义的使用方案进行建模。Although the ISO specifications are most informative on the structure itself, the class is designed to model the usage scenarios defined in specifications issued by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) Public Key Infrastructure, X.509 (PKIX) working group. 这些规范的最重要信息是 RFC 3280 "[证书和证书吊销列表（CRL）配置文件](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)"。The most informative of these specifications is RFC 3280, "[Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) Profile](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)." > [!IMPORTANT] > 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]开始，此类型实现 接口。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在 `try`/`catch` 块中调用其 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > > 对于面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] 和更早版本的应用程序， 类不实现 接口，因此没有 `Dispose` 方法。For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the class does not implement the interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 对象对文件进行加密和解密。The following example demonstrates how to use an object to encrypt and decrypt a file. [!code-csharp[X509Certificate2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509certificate2/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[X509Certificate2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509certificate2/vb/program.vb#1)] 下面的示例创建一个命令行可执行文件，该命令行可执行文件将证书文件作为参数，并将各种证书属性打印到控制台。The following example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. [!code-cpp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CPP/certinfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CS/certinfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/VB/certinfo.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将创建一个空的 对象，这与此类的其他构造函数不同，后者使用字节数组、指针或证书文件中的证书信息。This constructor creates an empty object, unlike the other constructors for this class that use certificate information from a byte array, a pointer, or a certificate file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户证书存储，仅选择活动证书，并允许用户选择一个或多个证书。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 然后，该示例将证书信息写入控制台。The example then writes certificate information to the console. [!code-cpp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用来自字节数组的信息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using information from a byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用字节数组中的证书信息创建新的 对象。This constructor creates a new object using certificate information from a byte array. 字节数组可以是编码的二进制文件 (DER) 或 Base64 编码的 X.509 数据。The byte array can be binary (DER) encoded or Base64-encoded X.509 data. 字节数组还可以是 PKCS7 （Authenticode）签名文件;签名者证书用于创建对象。The byte array can also be a PKCS7 (Authenticode) signed file; the signer certificate is used to create the object. 如果通过指定 `rawData`的 PKCS7 签名文件存储来创建 证书，则会为该存储区（而不是存储中的任何证书）的证书创建 。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

exception.span: 发生了与证书有关的错误。

span.span: An error with the certificate occurs.
For example:
- The certificate file does not exist.
- The certificate is invalid.
- The certificate's password is incorrect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用 Microsoft 加密 API 证书上下文的句柄（`PCCERT_CONTEXT`）创建新的 对象。This constructor creates a new object using a handle for the Microsoft Cryptographic API certificate context, `PCCERT_CONTEXT`. 请注意，此构造函数的直接调用方需要非托管代码权限。Note that the immediate caller of this constructor requires unmanaged code permission. > [!IMPORTANT] > 构造函数创建证书上下文的副本。The constructor creates a copy of the certificate context. 不要假设您传递给构造函数的上下文结构是有效的;它可能已被释放。Do not assume that the context structure you passed to the constructor is valid; it may have been released. 可以从 属性获取当前 `PCCERT_CONTEXT` 结构的副本，但它仅在 对象的生存期内有效。You can get a copy of the current `PCCERT_CONTEXT` structure from the property, but it is valid only during the lifetime of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数与包含证书私钥的 PKCS12 （PFX）文件一起使用。This constructor is used with PKCS12 (PFX) files that contain the certificate's private key. 使用正确的密码调用此构造函数将对私钥进行解密，并将其保存到密钥容器。Calling this constructor with the correct password decrypts the private key and saves it to a key container. > [!IMPORTANT] > 切勿在源代码中对密码进行硬编码。Never hard code a password within your source code. 使用[Ildasm （IL 拆装器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler)、十六进制编辑器或只是在文本编辑器（例如 notepad.exe）中打开程序集，可以从程序集检索硬编码的密码。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果通过指定 `rawData`的 PKCS7 签名文件存储来创建 证书，则会为该存储区（而不是存储中的任何证书）的证书创建 。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用一个字节数组、一个访问证书数据所需的密码和一个密钥存储标志来创建新的 对象。This constructor creates a new object using a byte array, a password that is needed to access the certificate data, and a key storage flag. 它与包含证书私钥的 PKCS12 （PFX）文件一起使用。It is used with PKCS12 (PFX) files that contain the certificate's private key. 使用正确的密码调用此构造函数将对私钥进行解密，并将其保存到 Microsoft 加密 API 加密服务提供程序（CSP）。Calling this constructor with the correct password decrypts the private key and saves it to a Microsoft Cryptographic API Cryptographic Service Provider (CSP). > [!IMPORTANT] > 切勿在源代码中对密码进行硬编码。Never hard code a password within your source code. 使用[Ildasm （IL 拆装器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler)、十六进制编辑器或只是在文本编辑器（例如 notepad.exe）中打开程序集，可以从程序集检索硬编码的密码。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果通过指定 `rawData`的 PKCS7 签名文件存储来创建 证书，则会为该存储区（而不是存储中的任何证书）的证书创建 。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

exception.span: 发生了与证书有关的错误。

span.span: An error with the certificate occurs.
For example:
- The certificate file does not exist.
- The certificate is invalid.
- The certificate's password is incorrect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅对与存储关联的证书设置此属性。This property is set only on a certificate that is associated with a store. 如果设置了属性，并将证书添加到证书存储区，则会保留值。If the property is set and the certificate is added to a certificate store, the value is persisted. 如果在从存储区中检索到的证书上设置了该属性，则会立即保留值。If the property is set on a certificate retrieved from a store, the value is persisted immediately. 在 x.509 存储中，存档的证书不包含在返回的 对象中，除非 属性设置为 `true`。In an X.509 store, archived certificates are not included in the returned object unless the property is set to `true`. 设置或取消设置 值时，不会发生物理存档活动。No physical archival activity occurs when the value is set or unset. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户证书存储，仅选择活动证书，并允许用户选择一个或多个证书。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 然后，该示例将证书信息写入控制台。The example then writes certificate information to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks X.509 v3 证书格式中定义的扩展允许在证书中包含其他数据。The extensions defined in the X.509 v3 certificate format allow additional data to be included in the certificate. X.509 v3 定义以及 RFC 3280 "[证书和证书吊销列表（CRL）配置文件](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)" 中的 PKIX 定义了许多扩展。A number of extensions are defined by ISO in the X.509 v3 definition as well as by PKIX in RFC 3280, "[Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) Profile](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)." 常见扩展包含有关密钥用法（）、密钥标识符（）、证书策略、吊销信息（CRL 分发点扩展）以及其他用途的信息。Common extensions include information regarding key usage (), key identifiers (), certificate policies, revocation information (CRL Distribution Point extension), and other uses. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户证书存储，仅选择活动证书，并允许用户选择一个或多个证书。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 然后，该示例将证书信息写入控制台。The example then writes certificate information to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 友好名称是可设置的 x.509 证书存储中的属性。Friendly names are properties in the X.509 certificate store that can be set. 它们用于使用户能够将别名与证书相关联，以便能够轻松地识别它们。They are used to enable a user to associate aliases with certificates so they can be easily identified. 如果证书不存在友好名称，则返回空字符串（""）。If no friendly name exists for the certificate, an empty string ("") is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个命令行可执行文件，该命令行可执行文件将证书文件作为参数，并将各种证书属性打印到控制台。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于获取 x.509 证书的原始字节数组，并使用其关联值填充 的对象。This method can be used to take a raw byte array of an X.509 certificate and populate the object with its associated values. 由于此方法只接受字节数组，因此它只能用于不需要密码的证书类型，包括 Base64 编码或 DER 编码的 x.509 证书或 PFX/PKCS12 证书。Since this method accepts only a byte array, it can be used only for certificate types that do not require a password, including a Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificate or a PFX/PKCS12 certificate. 请注意，PFX/PKCS12 证书可包含多个证书。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate. 在这种情况下，将使用与私钥关联的第一个证书，或者如果找不到私钥，则使用第一个证书。In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用一个证书文件（如扩展名为 .cer 的文件）来表示 x.509 证书，并使用该文件包含的证书填充 对象。This method uses a certificate file, such as a file with a .cer extension, that represents an X.509 certificate and populates the object with the certificate the file contains. 此方法可与多种证书类型一起使用，包括 Base64 编码或 DER 编码的 x.509 证书、PFX/PKCS12 证书和签名程序证书（如 Authenticode）。This method can be used with several certificate types, including Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificates, PFX/PKCS12 certificates, and signer certificates such as Authenticode. 请注意，PFX/PKCS12 证书可包含多个证书。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate. 在这种情况下，将使用与私钥关联的第一个证书，或者如果找不到私钥，则使用第一个证书。In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used.

span.span: Populates an object using data from a byte array, a password, and flags for determining how to import the private key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于使用由字节数组表示的证书的密码填充 对象。This method can be used to populate an object using a password for the certificate represented by the byte array. 值可用于控制导入私钥的位置和方式。The value can be used to control where and how to import the private key. 此方法接受字节数组，可用于证书类型，如 Base64 编码的 x.509 证书或 "DER 编码的 PKCS12 证书" 或 "PFX/证书"。This method accepts a byte array and can be used for certificate types such as Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificates or PFX/PKCS12 certificates. 请注意，PFX/PKCS12 证书可包含多个证书。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate. 在这种情况下，将使用与私钥关联的第一个证书，或者如果找不到私钥，则使用第一个证书。In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 切勿在源代码中对密码进行硬编码。Never hard code a password within your source code. 使用[Ildasm （IL 拆装器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler)、十六进制编辑器或只是在文本编辑器（例如 notepad.exe）中打开程序集，可以从程序集检索硬编码的密码。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个命令行可执行文件，该命令行可执行文件将证书文件作为参数，并将各种证书属性打印到控制台。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. [!code-cpp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CPP/certinfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CS/certinfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/VB/certinfo.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性当前仅支持 RSA 或 DSA 密钥，因此它将在 .NET Core 中返回 或 对象，或者在 .NET Framework 中返回 或 对象。Currently this property supports only RSA or DSA keys, so it returns either an or a object in .NET Core or an or a object in .NET Framework. 如果没有与证书关联的私钥，则将返回 `null`。If no private key is associated with the certificate, it returns `null`. > [!WARNING] > 如果将此属性设置为 `null` 或其他密钥，而不先删除它，则会在磁盘上保留一个私钥文件。If you set this property to `null` or to another key without first deleting it, a private key file is left on the disk. 若要正确删除与此属性关联的私钥，请将 `PersistKeyInCsp` 设置为 `false`，然后调用 方法。To properly delete the private key associated with this property, set `PersistKeyInCsp` to `false`, and then call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户证书存储，仅选择活动证书，并允许用户选择一个或多个证书。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 然后，该示例将证书信息写入控制台。The example then writes certificate information to the console. param.span: 为 则显示公钥、私钥、扩展等；为 则显示类似于 类的信息，包括指纹、序列号、主题和颁发者名称等。

span.span: to display the public key, private key, extensions, and so forth; to display information that is similar to the class, including thumbprint, serial number, subject and issuer names, and so on.

summary.span: 以文本格式显示 X.509 证书。

span.span: Displays an X.509 certificate in text format.
The certificate information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与所有 `ToString` 方法一样，输出在不同版本的 .NET Framework 中可能不一致，因此不应为内容分析方法结果。As with all `ToString` methods, the output might not be consistent across versions of the .NET Framework, so the method results should not be parsed for content. 使用 对象上的属性来获取准确的信息。Use the properties on the object to obtain precise information. 此方法以文本格式显示证书。This method displays the certificate in text format. 如果 `verbose` 参数设置为 `true`，则文本显示包括公钥、私钥和扩展名。If the `verbose` parameter is set to `true`, the text display includes the public key, private key, and extensions. 如果 `verbose` 设置为 `false`，则文本显示包含 x.509 证书中的可用字段，包括指纹、序列号、主题和颁发者名称以及有效性日期信息。If `verbose` is set to `false`, the text display includes those fields available from the X.509 certificate, including thumbprint, serial number, subject and issuer names, and validity date information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个命令行可执行文件，它将证书文件作为参数，并将各种证书属性打印到控制台。The following code example creates a command line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. [!code-cpp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CPP/certinfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CS/certinfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/VB/certinfo.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用基本验证策略执行 X.509 链验证。

span.span: Performs a X.509 chain validation using basic validation policy.

returns.span: 如果验证成功，则为 ；如果验证失败，则为 。

span.span: if the validation succeeds; if the validation fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法为证书生成一个简单的链，并将基本策略应用到该链。This method builds a simple chain for the certificate and applies the base policy to that chain. 如果需要有关失败的详细信息，请使用 对象直接验证证书。If you need more information about a failure, validate the certificate directly using the object. 请注意，可以使用 类重写默认链接引擎。Note that the default chaining engine can be overridden using the class. 在 Microsoft Windows Server 2003 上，默认引擎符合 RFC3280 "[证书和证书吊销列表（CRL）配置文件](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)" 中所述的规范。On Microsoft Windows Server 2003, the default engine conforms to the specification described in RFC3280, "[Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) Profile](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)." ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户证书存储，仅选择活动证书，并允许用户选择一个或多个证书。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 然后，该示例将证书信息写入控制台。The example then writes certificate information to the console. [!code-cpp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有多种版本的 x.509 证书。There are several versions of X.509 certificates. 此属性标识证书使用的格式。This property identifies which format the certificate uses. 例如，为版本3证书返回 "3"。For example, "3" is returned for a version 3 certificate. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个命令行可执行文件，该命令行可执行文件将证书文件作为参数，并将各种证书属性打印到控制台。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console.
